name: Just Ice Served
description:
This is a 2D sidescrolling runner game made for the 2020 Two-Button Jam.

You play as a "snow vigilante", running around your neighborhood throwing snowballs at every criminal you see while avoiding the corrupt cops that are out to get you. Hit as many criminals as you can in Endless Mode, or help the snow vigilante avenge his fallen comrade in Story Mode.

This game was conceptualized and programmed by Kyle Liang (Georgia Tech) and Dion Pimentel (ASU). All art assets were created from scratch, and the game's music was arranged by Stefan DeBates (Georgia Tech).
